example.text: You can't make this up: House Republicans are beginning floor consideration *today* of a bill that would defund efforts to crack down on unemployment fraud. On the same day that one of their own members was hit with a criminal indictment for unemployment fraud. [[url]]

Northern Virginia, like much of the country, faces a crisis in affordable housing. Our bipartisan bill would expand and update the most effective tool for financing affordable housing, to build nearly two million new affordable homes over the next decade: [[url]]

More here via [[user]]: House Takes Up bill To Cut Fraud Prevention After Santos Arrest For Unemployment Fraud "Rep. George Santos is a co-sponsor of the bill, which would cut funding to crack down on unemployment fraud." [[url]]

We passed the CARES Act to save millions from disaster during the pandemic. Republicans, who attack people who need unemployment benefits, just passed a bill to make our system more vulnerable to fraud. One of those who passed it was indicted for unemployment fraud yesterday. [[url]]

You can't make this up: House Republicans are beginning floor consideration *today* of a bill that would defund efforts to crack down on unemployment fraud. On the same day that one of their own members was hit with a criminal indictment for unemployment fraud. [[url]]

MAGA Republicans just passed the Child Deportation Act, an ugly bill that betrays American values. Others are highlighting the bill's many draconian attacks on immigrants- I want to also point out that it would kill our asylum system for Afghans and Ukrainians. Just awful. [[url]]
